summary: AN ORDINANCE, relating to City employment, to be known as the Fourth Quarter 2000 Salary Ordinance, establishing new titles and/or salaries in various departments; adopting a new salary range for a title that is limited to positions in the City's Supported Employment Program; creating new salary rates; adjusting a Pay Band in the Legislative Department; designating positions to be exempt from civil service, and amending the Seattle Municipal Code (S.M.C.) 4.13.010, Section 7, also known as the Exemptions Ordinance (120166); all by a 2/3 vote of the Council.
